Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
@Ludom 
Well, exposure to the project is a much needed and overlooked aspect. 
"Community and BizDev" is highly needed, despite many peoples claims/feelings to the contrary.
For example, 
I believe @TwilightPunkster K64 , while roped in by Myese ( through community development), was eventually sold on KMD by me.  He and I spent countless hours on the phone last week and ultimately I sent him 1,000 of my personal KMD stack to him as a sign of good faith from the community that we will support him any way we can.   He is an amazing human with an amazing attitude and work ethic. 

He flat out wanted to turn down the 7,777 bounty for an SDK at first.   Flat out.  
To say he hasn't been amazing for the community in his first week is not something anyone would agree with. 
If he disagrees with me, he won't hesitate to say it, I am sure.  There are many others here due to my direct involvement with community growth, mostly KMD. 
https://twitter.com/2ndOldest/status/1104762636292448256

So yes, community building and development has intangibles that are extremely valuable to the ecosystem.
That said, I'm only 1/2 of the team.  @mrlynch is the dev side.  He is working on many things developmentally related to z address functions as well as ecosystem building in addition to my work on Bizdev for adoption.  Please see his proposal for more information.  
In addition to this, 80% of the rewards are supporting the ecosystem including Pirate, LABS, Verus and the community users. 
Only 20% of the mining rewards are going to the operators, 100% of which I am committing to Mr. Lynch.
So no, mining rewards are not directly going to "Support social and community growth".
I hope that bounties as a solution to social and community involvement aren't really thought of as the best way to engage community and integration outlets.  
https://twitter.com/PirateChain/status/1106234353862893570

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: https://twitter.com/airratchet/status/1106239153883283456

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
I stay up until 2 AM more than 3 nights a week and wake up at 6-7 AM every day to start work on Pirate and pushing the KMD narrative.   I am sorry if my post seems standoffish.   I work VERY hard spending hours each day on this project, and have been ramping this up for the past 14 Months. to where it's a 2nd fulltime job since October.  
I hope you appreciate the work that people like myself do as much as I know people like me appreciate the work you guys do.  Without you there is no us.  We know this.

Author: Alright#0419
Content: @FishyGuts your contributions may be "intangible"(i personally don't think so), but I believe the relevant people understand your impact on the ecosystem

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
I was up until 4 AM last night and the night before preparing for a z commerce launch that will enable us to cover 75% of ecommerce stores with z address transactions.  That's huge and that's going to take a lot of business and community development to achieve adoption.  
Achieving a node or two for Pirate will allow more funds for freelance developers such as @radix42 who is working on a KMD full node port for me to the Nodl and for Satinder to the RISC-V.  To pay @ComputerGenie üë¥üèºüì¢ for enabling new functionality to old wallet.  To support @webworker01 for his work on all things Pirate related.  To @Deleted User for his work on Tortuga... and so on. 
I am going to enjoy the ride together with all of you no matter what.  That is the truth and I wish the best chances to win for all.  I wish there were infinite nodes to offer to those who work on KMD.

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: Thank you @Alright

Author: phm87#7395
Content: I have some kmd on a coinomi wallet but I think it won t work with coinomi. I recently added KMD to my pool and found some blocks. Should I put everything on the kmd node ? How to get the VOTE ? Using private keys of kmd ?

Author: Alright#0419
Content: Yes, there will be a time announced at which KMD will be snapshotted. Shortly after this, VOTE2019 will launch, and balances from KMD will be airdropped to it. Notaries will have an address tied to them. When the voting deadline comes, whichever candidates have the highest balance of VOTE2019 will receive a notary position.

Author: Alright#0419
Content: The private key for the VOTE will be the private key for the KMD

Author: Alright#0419
Content: ie, import KMD WIF to VOTE2019 daemon

Content: It makes sense. Thank you for the explanation

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
@Ludom - Thank you for your response.  I agree with you and have personal experience with Ghosting node operators.  
To put it Simply, Mr. Lynch is in fact considering taking his job to part time to focus on Node operation, and development for pirate, it's projects and so on.  He reached out about the Python wrapper but it appears @Deleted User is already working on it.   
I assure you, the "bizdev" (hate that phrase by the way :P) is only 1/2 of our users.  
I do also intend to become familiar with all of the requirements to run and maintain a node so that we have people on both sides of the planet able to service nodes üòÉ 

I had a feeling @mrlynch - Thanks for being on top of it.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: any sort of cap on amount of votes is DOA

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: technical people will just split funds into addresses with the max allowed amount and non-technical ones will be outvoted N to 1, so that is much much worse

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: also, any sort of fantasy about 1 person 1 vote, assumes that this is what is actually desired. do we really want all people to have the same amount of influence on the outcome?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: since this is politics, there wont be any agreement on even what is desired

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and whatever is desired, likely wont be able to be implemented, even if it can be agreed upon

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: feel free to propose potential improvements,but unless if weighs the voting based on some sort of metric that helps get better results, the weight will be based on KMD
